snippet: Cory Booker, who as mayor of Newark has become a national celebrity, said he would run in the special election to fill the seat vacated when Frank Lautenberg died.
abstract: Cory A Booker officially declares his campaign for United States Senate; Booker, who has become national celebrity as mayor of Newark and enters race heavily favored, says he will run in special election to fill seat vacated when Sen Frank Lautenberg died.
lead_paragraph: Cory Booker, who as mayor of Newark has become a national celebrity, said he would run in the special election to fill the seat vacated when Frank Lautenberg died.

headline.seo: Booker Formally Declares Candidacy for Senate Seat
headline.main: Booker Formally Declares Candidacy for Senate Seat
headline.print_headline: Booker Formally Declares Candidacy for Senate Seat
